name: Deep Learning Specialization
description: Completed Coursera's Deep Learning Specialization by Andrew Ng.
longDescription:
This specialization covered the foundational concepts of deep learning, including neural networks, convolutional networks, recurrent networks, and transformers. I gained practical experience with TensorFlow and Keras, implementing various models for image recognition, natural language processing, and sequence modeling.

The course significantly enhanced my understanding of modern AI techniques and their applications.

name: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
description: Achieved foundational certification in AWS cloud services.
longDescription:
The AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner certification validates my foundational understanding of AWS cloud concepts, services, security, architecture, pricing, and support. It provided a broad overview of the AWS platform and its core offerings.

This certification is a stepping stone for further exploration into cloud computing and its role in modern software and hardware infrastructure.
